title: BRIEF-Lundin Gold Provides Update On Impact Of Civil Unrest On Its Fruta Del Norte Gold Project
text:
BRIEF-Lundin Gold Provides Update On Impact Of Civil Unrest On Its Fruta Del Norte Gold Project

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 13, 2019 19:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Lundin Gold Provides Update On Impact Of Civil Unrest On Its Fruta Del Norte Gold Project Oct 13 (Reuters) - Lundin Gold Inc : * LUNDIN GOLD PROVIDES UPDATE ON IMPACT OF CIVIL UNREST ON ITS FRUTA DEL NORTE GOLD PROJECT * LUNDIN GOLD - AT THIS TIME, CO DOES NOT FORESEE IMPACT ON GOAL OF FIRST GOLD PRODUCTION THIS QUARTER AND WORK RELATED TO OUTSTANDING PERMITS CONTINUES * COMPANY HAS CURTAILED SOME ACTIVITIES IN CERTAIN AREAS OF FRUTA DEL NORTE GOLD PROJECT * CONTINUES TO MONITOR SITUATION TO ENSURE SAFETY OF ITS PERSONNEL AND SECURITY OF PROJECT * COMPANY HAS TEMPORARILY CEASED OR REDUCED ACTIVITIES RELATED TO MINING, EARTHWORKS AND COMMISSIONING OF PROCESS PLANT

BRIEF-Lundin Gold Provides Update On Impact Of Civil Unrest On Its Fruta Del Norte Gold Project
description: BRIEF-Lundin Gold Provides Update On Impact Of Civil Unrest On Its Fruta Del Norte Gold Project
